titre_com: Don't touch with a barge pole!
commentaire: Don't touch with a barge pole!It makes me doubt the veracity of the reviews here, had an account with them for 6 moths and it has been nothing but problems but it sort of worked with work-arounds. In September they suspended international payments, supposedly for the moth September, they are still suspended today 04/November/2021... And to brighten up my day, it seems to me all payments are now suspended, even within France as nothing goes out and transactions just evaporate from the system. And the customer service? As if it wasn't there... no answers, nothing...So, tell me this, how can a bank that has got all transfers suspended and doesn't answer help line get 4.5 stars???
commentaire_text: don't touch with a barge pole it makes me doubt the veracity of the reviews here, had an account with them for 6 moths and it has been nothing but problems but it sort of worked with work arounds. in september they suspended international payments, supposedly for the moth september, they are still suspended today 04 november 2021... and to brighten up my day, it seems to me all payments are now suspended, even within france as nothing goes out and transactions just evaporate from the system. and the customer service as if it wasn't there... no answers, nothing...so, tell me this, how can a bank that has got all transfers suspended and doesn't answer help line get 4.5 stars

commentaire: Orange bank was about to close, Hello Bank was then suggested as an alternative.My partner has a residence in France but does not speak English. The advisor I had on the phone said communication would be a problem, thus it would be better for him to open an account in one of their offices. Sounds to me more like passing along a "problem" he doesn't want to deal with. When told we were opening an account upon the recommendation of Orange Bank, he broke the number 1 rule of sales personnel. He said and get this, you are not obliged to open an account with us, it was only a recommendation. Bad vibes started from the message he left on my mobile. I played it 4 times to try to catch the name of the company. Never mentioned. This holds truth, one who can't handle small tasks, cannot achieve excellence anywhere.
reponses: Hello S.R,We are sorry to read about this situation. We are indeed a french bank and even if some of our advisors can speak a little english, we do not provide a full english service. The advisor suggested your partner to open an account with BNP Paribas which is our main company and which provide international services and english speaking advisors.Here's the link to follow : https://mabanque.bnpparibas/en/homeWe wish you the best and a nice day.Michael
commentaire_text: orange bank was about to close, hello bank was then suggested as an alternative.my partner has a residence in france but does not speak english. the advisor i had on the phone said communication would be a problem, thus it would be better for him to open an account in one of their offices. sounds to me more like passing along a problem he doesn't want to deal with. when told we were opening an account upon the recommendation of orange bank, he broke the number 1 rule of sales personnel. he said and get this, you are not obliged to open an account with us, it was only a recommendation. bad vibes started from the message he left on my mobile. i played it 4 times to try to catch the name of the company. never mentioned. this holds truth, one who can't handle small tasks, cannot achieve excellence anywhere.

titre_com: Compte ouvert il y a quelques mois
commentaire: Compte ouvert il y a quelques mois . Pour l instant pas de souci mais je trouve les réponses par mails un peu longue 2 a 3 jours . Paiement par carte le 6 juillet multiplie par 3 et à ce jour pas remboursé de la différence.pas de numéro service client . Dommage 😰 sinon rien a dire.
reponses: Bonjour,Merci d'avoir partagé votre expérience.Nous sommes navrés pour les délais de réponse. Nous nous efforçons de répondre sous un délai maximum de 24h ouvrées (hors week-end).Nous vous invitons à nous contacter au 01 76 35 02 95 pour toute difficulté rencontrée (joignable de 9h30 à 17h30).À votre disposition.

commentaire: I wasn't able to login to my account because of a bug and their support was unreactive, I had to wait 24h to make any payment in behalf of my business and this is for us a critical no-go.EDIT: We got called by their team to apologize and also got a free month of some extra service as a gift. commentaire: Younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and I cannot deny this.However, I have rated it two (2) stars due to issues I encountered after making an early payment with the "reduce installment amount" option. Despite discussing this with customer service, the following month I was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately €30, but it was not reduced, and I still received the full amount.I await clarification as soon as possible, especially since Younited is aware that I have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.I urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.Sincerely,
reponses: Good morning,We thank you for taking the time to leave us a comment.We are delighted to have you among our customers, however, we are sorry to read that you are not fully satisfied with your Younited experience.We apologize for the inconvenience caused and we will do everything we can to ensure that your experience at Younited is optimal.Do not hesitate to send us any other comments as customer satisfaction is at the heart of our concerns.Have a great day,
commentaire_text: younited is a good platform that offers a fast and reliable initial service, and i cannot deny this.however, i have rated it two 2 stars due to issues i encountered after making an early payment with the reduce installment amount option. despite discussing this with customer service, the following month i was supposed to see my installment reduced by approximately 30, but it was not reduced, and i still received the full amount.i await clarification as soon as possible, especially since younited is aware that i have paid several installments to close the account earlier, and these were higher payments to finish sooner.i urgently await clarification and resolution of this issue.sincerely,

commentaire: As an existing client of BNP Paribas, I proceeded to open an account at Hello Bank. Thinking I would be able to open an account faster (since Hello Bank is the property of BNP Paribas), my request has been declined a couple of days later.I then proceeded to contact their Customer Support, which told me that they had studied my request, but declined it "without giving any additional information", indicating "they are not required to provide a reason".Stay away. Horrible honestly. If you're truly looking for an online bank, try Boursorama Banque instead. I've had no problem ever since I joined them a couple of months ago (plus they support Google Pay, unlike the useless and slow Paylib system supported by Hello Bank).
commentaire_text: as an existing client of bnp paribas, i proceeded to open an account at hello bank. thinking i would be able to open an account faster since hello bank is the property of bnp paribas , my request has been declined a couple of days later.i then proceeded to contact their customer support, which told me that they had studied my request, but declined it without giving any additional information , indicating they are not required to provide a reason .stay away. horrible honestly. if you're truly looking for an online bank, try boursorama banque instead. i've had no problem ever since i joined them a couple of months ago plus they support google pay, unlike the useless and slow paylib system supported by hello bank .

titre_com: My teen is without card since several…
commentaire: My teen is without card since several weeks. Again and again we are assured that a card has been sent, but no card ever arrived. There is no customer service. You are constantly wasting your time chatting with bots. If you have a real person (and you cannot really be sure of that because the answers are standardised) they promise to solve the problem but nothing happens. Yet, we have to pay for the card and the subscription. Kard does not share any proof that a card was ever sent. I have asked to be reimbursed and to receive my money back. We will see how long it takes. Great deception. It would be a good if they had customer service. Update: after several weeks and repeated lies about cards having been sent, I asked to close the account and be reimbursed. It is then that Kard informed me that their cards are out of stock! And they have no idea when cards will be restocked.
commentaire_text: my teen is without card since several weeks. again and again we are assured that a card has been sent, but no card ever arrived. there is no customer service. you are constantly wasting your time chatting with bots. if you have a real person and you cannot really be sure of that because the answers are standardised they promise to solve the problem but nothing happens. yet, we have to pay for the card and the subscription. kard does not share any proof that a card was ever sent. i have asked to be reimbursed and to receive my money back. we will see how long it takes. great deception. it would be a good if they had customer service. update after several weeks and repeated lies about cards having been sent, i asked to close the account and be reimbursed. it is then that kard informed me that their cards are out of stock and they have no idea when cards will be restocked.
